title: *Amazing Studio!!**Franklin Ave!!**Schedule an Appointment Today!!*
posting_body: ['Welcome to Franklin Ave in the great Crown Heights!', 'This is an incredibly priced-studio apartment located in the heart of Crown Heights!', 'Apartment features:', '• Hardwood floors', '• High ceilings', '• Original built-in mantle with mirror', '• Spacious closet with additional storage compartments above', '• Spacious kitchen with an ample number of cabinets', '• Hallway linen closet', '• Small pets welcome upon approval', '*The apartment is on the 3rd floor of a walk-up.', 'The apartment is conveniently located near Little Zelda (Cafe), La Napa (Tapas Bar), and The Crown Inn.', 'The GalaFresh Farms (Great selection of affordable produce and organic foods) and Jewel City Yoga are also nearby!', 'Applicants should be able to provide documentation of 40x rent and a 650+ credit score.', '* THIS IS A STUDIO APARTMENT.', '*There is a 12% fee for the renting of the unit.', 'Contact us today for a viewing and make this incredible apartment your new Brooklyn home!']
